change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 214/2009, effective September 3, 2009.

reg.title: District of Esquimalt Additional Powers Regulation

section.sectiontext: The District of Esquimalt is granted the additional powers

paragraph.paragraphtext: to designate areas for intensive residential development in its official community plan or plans for the purposes of section 920 of the Local Government Act, and
to define the meaning of the term "intensive residential development".

section.sectiontext: Section 920 (8) of the Local Government Act applies to the authority of the District of Esquimalt to designate areas of intensive residential development.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Local Government Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 323, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 251]
